summary: The diff clearly updates global CSS tokens and Tailwind color mappings toward a teal theme, and applies some teal-related classes in a UI component. However, the required new static hero image asset is not added (no new files), and the hero background change/bottom-justified positioning cannot be verified from the provided truncated App.tsx diff. There is also at least one instance of hard-coded color usage that goes against the token-driven intent.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new hero image as a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it from the hero section implementation (do not serve the image from the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff, so the required static image file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` is not present based on the provided change summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the hero/header background image with the user-provided image and adjust the hero background positioning to be bottom-justified while preserving existing overlay and text readability.
missing_requirements.reason: The hero implementation is presumably in `frontend/src/App.tsx`, but the diff for that file is truncated and the provided visible portion does not show the hero section/background styling or `background-position: bottom/center bottom`. Therefore the required change cannot be confirmed from available evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a hard-coded OKLCH background color on the Secretary discoverability nudge card instead of relying purely on global tokens.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest emphasizes token-driven teal accents and avoiding hard-coded color values to achieve teal styling; the diff adds a literal color value (`bg-[oklch(...)]`) rather than a token utility for that background.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated internal project tracking metadata in `project_state.json` (feature request entries AR-1..AR-6).
hallucinated_features.reason: This file and its tracking entries are not part of the requested UI theming/image requirements; itâ€™s additional bookkeeping not specified in the BuildRequest.
